name: get_specific_event_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sagenda_v3.
Tool description: We are now hosted on PostMan : https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/3283093/SW7aXT2M?version=latest
API description: Fetch and return information for a specific event using the event identifier.

eventidentifier.description: Unique identifier for the event to retrieve booking information.
